preqs: Twelve credit points of first-year Arts units.

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {ACL1%, AEH1%, AMU1%, ASA1%, ATS1%, AZA1%}

unitName: Transforming community: Project design and public relations for social campaigns
description: In this unit, students will explore the practical side of developing a project for community improvement.  Students will develop a project proposal, a funding application, and a public relations campaign for the selected social issue.
